"Compared to others?" San=
ton said as he looked at Perceptor, his face
drawn and tense as he listened=

changes he had done to Nightlight. =

to her that a being could do! You tried=

tried to make her into something else! Hopw can=

was no difference at all, could ever become an Autobot.
